Summary: Luminous White, stationary balloon shaped object at least 15,000 miles up that just disappeared into thin air on a clear early morning sky
divs: sighting detailsi was driving into work on interstate 40 west from north little rock, ar, towards conway, ar. i was looking up periodically on the way to work because the moon was still slightly visible and very clear and full. it was a clear sky with minimal cloud coverage (though some clouds were in the sky). the full moon was up to my left and while looking back down while driving (yes, not very safe i know, but i wasn't texting), i see this white shape to the right and over of the moon. i did a double take to see what it was exactly as we have an air force base in little rock and a small airstrip for private planes near by where i was located. i then could make out the shape clearly. it was balloon shaped, irradescent white\pearly and like all those other ufo sighting videos you see on youtube or what have you i was thinking to myself...is this a balloon way up there?! then i had enough time to actually start checking my facts while still looking from the object and back to the road. it was a long ways up (at least 15,000 miles or more) and there's no way i would be able to discern a baloon that far up (and can a balloon even get that far up). and then i thought, well...it's not moving at all. it was completely stationary. there was nothing else around it (no objects, no lights, no haze, nothing). i went a couple of miles just trying to figure out if i should just pull over and still trying to figure out what it could or could not be. i'm still travelling about 60 mph and then it just vanished. poof...gone...no movement, no nothing...just poof. i was flabberghasted and just looking around wondering where it went??? i couldn't see it anywhere...the moon was still there...a cloud didn't come in front of the space where it was located. it just disappeared. i have no idea what it was and i have a whole new appreciation for all those nutters out there with their video recorders trying to focus in on these things...these things are so high up in the air you would have to have a good camera (like nasa quality) to focus in on it and be able to make it out. i always thought that they didn't focus in on it to really make it out because then you would be able to tell what it is...like a balloon.. (and maybe that is still true for some) but in this case, you would have to have something significantly powerful that could focus in on it. like you would be trying to focus in on a plane that high up and be able to show you some specifics (like how many windows are on it that far up)...so you can see how hard this would be. unfortunately, as this is my first experience it took me a minute to finally think about pulling over and doing a poor attempt at getting a picture with my cell phone. so, now photos or anything. but i am really considering bringing my recorder even though i probably won't be able to get much if it's that far up again. for sure, this was not a plane or a weather balloon or any of that nonsense. anyway, my first ufo sighting (i'm 33 and somewhat of a skeptic). hoping for more now...
